title: Benefactor
author: Benefactor
content: I don't know him createspace he copy paste my POA so please check again .. he copy my BTC address so i don't know him so please remove my red trusthere is POA: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5390603.msg59591780#msg59591780so please remove my red trust @Pandu Geddon and @CryptopreneurBrainboss

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Ok, lets say for a sake of the argument that you are not connected to createspace and that he just copied your bitcoin address frame you (for what other reason would he do that?), how do you explain connection with another bounty abuser via sending BNB? Is it another coincidence?Quote from: Pandu Geddon on May 11, 2022, 01:33:08 PM@Benefactor connected BNB transaction with @farukahmed : https://bscscan.com/address/0x837854e27325da6fe61d4b439ce2e992d698eaf4Quote0xDD08c599318A71F9525ae7D3513525E16cb50F16 : farukahmed 0x53D209fb6F6f12F73aC86D756C71Ea49AD98c9e9 : Benefactor join same bounty project:Seasonal Tokens Bounty Campaign | Manager: CryptopreneurBrainboss | SPREADSHEET | createspace: article and Video | Benefactor: signature

comments.author: Benefactor
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on May 12, 2022, 12:49:22 PMOk, lets say for a sake of the argument that you are not connected to createspace and that he just copied your bitcoin address frame you (for what other reason would he do that?), how do you explain connection with another bounty abuser via sending BNB? Is it another coincidence?Quote from: Pandu Geddon on May 11, 2022, 01:33:08 PM@Benefactor connected BNB transaction with @farukahmed : https://bscscan.com/address/0x837854e27325da6fe61d4b439ce2e992d698eaf4Quote0xDD08c599318A71F9525ae7D3513525E16cb50F16 : farukahmed 0x53D209fb6F6f12F73aC86D756C71Ea49AD98c9e9 : Benefactor join same bounty project:Seasonal Tokens Bounty Campaign | Manager: CryptopreneurBrainboss | SPREADSHEET | createspace: article and Video | Benefactor: signatureTruly he is my friend he want to help from me some bnb so it was my mistake I send him so please it was my mistake so please forgive me and remove red trust

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: @Benefactor, are you even the original owner of this account?  It would be nice to have the public confirmation with a signed message from any of these addresses:Quote from: Benefactor on July 30, 2013, 07:38:04 AMBTC:  15TKF1C48FNTSEaJdpx72JuREZR7Dq7br5Quote from: Benefactor on January 06, 2015, 05:09:25 PMmy BTC:  1AvPYxy7Qs5oT8AcDvqrbGiXQSJmsjjeXB

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Benefactor on May 12, 2022, 01:02:44 PMTruly he is my friend he want to help from me some bnb so it was my mistake I send him so please it was my mistake so please forgive me and remove red trust First of all, I am not the one who gave you negative feedback so its not up to me whether your feedback gets removed or not. Regarding your explanation, even if that is true, we heard it so many times before from every bounty abuser that was caught for a similar thing so good luck selling that to anyone.Quote from: FatFork on May 12, 2022, 01:04:04 PMIt would be nice to have the public confirmation with a signed message from any of these addresses:Huh, judging by recent OPs post history (looks like a classic signature campaign shitposter), it does look like lovesmayfamilis was right and the  account changed hands so we can expect another explanation why he can't provide signed message using that addresses. But even he proves that I doubt that will change his situation much.

Regarding your explanation, even if that is true, we heard it so many times before from every bounty abuser that was caught for a similar thing so good luck selling that to anyone.Quote from: FatFork on May 12, 2022, 01:04:04 PMIt would be nice to have the public confirmation with a signed message from any of these addresses:Huh, judging by recent OPs post history (looks like a classic signature campaign shitposter), it does look like lovesmayfamilis was right and the  account changed hands so we can expect another explanation why he can't provide signed message using that addresses. But even he proves that I doubt that will change his situation much.Sir actually I will change btc address but I am owner this account ,,

comments.body: please remove my red trust @Pandu Geddon and @CryptopreneurBrainboss

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Benefactor on May 12, 2022, 01:16:27 PMSir actually I will change btc address but I am owner this account ,, I don't think that you are getting what @FatFork asked you to do. So, to prove that you are the original owner of the account, sign bitcoin message using one of those two bitcoin addresses. If you don't know how to do it, here is the guide How to sign a message!?.Also, consecutive posting is against the forum rules.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.created_time: May 12, 2022, 01:44:14 PMLast edit: May 12, 2022, 02:09:33 PM by The Pharmacist
comments.body: *A little birdie whispered in my ear just now*:"Psst...you haven't slept, poor man.""This MoFo is just askin' for more negative feedback!!!"Evidence is solid, happy to oblige.  This is typically what happens when bounty abusers and account buyers try to publicly rehabilitate their image for the sake of further spamming the forum and otherwise making a spectacle of themselves.  Live and learn, OP.Quote from: Benefactor on May 12, 2022, 01:43:08 PMI also support and I want to remove my red trust now so how can I do ?Dude, you're done.  The forum is better off without you, and if anyone feels like arguing the point I'm going to bed.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: 1. in this thread you say you don't know him. but via PM, you said @createspace is your friend's account.2. You said @createspace copied your POA and BTC address. but I guess that's not true. you are the one copying the POA from @createspace.https://ninjastic.space/address/31jiSfj4pE8fYBF34cb9BqpU7YZqNUdcu4you are full of lies.no proof of defense, just pleas.there is no reason for me to remove the red paint on your account.

He wrote some random numbers and letters and it was a coincidence that he wrote your address?

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.created_time: May 12, 2022, 03:23:41 PMLast edit: May 12, 2022, 03:38:30 PM by The Pharmacist
comments.body: Quote from: Benefactor on May 12, 2022, 02:35:19 PMSir please remove red trust pleaseI just announced maybe an hour ago in big, 20-point font red lettering that I was going to tag your account--and subsequently did so.  What in the world do you think is going to persuade me to change my mind about that, your generic copy/paste pleading?  That's actually another example of why I said the forum is better off without you.  You're here to treat the forum as your place of employment (writing) and you suck at your job--just like many others that have come before you begging for some well-deserved feedback to be removed.I don't know about anyone else's feedback on you, but my neg is staying.  And all those positives you got years ago aren't even yours, which is deceitful.Quote from: Rikafip on May 12, 2022, 02:43:13 PMOn top of extra negative feedbacks, forum detectives usually find couple of their alts as there is always some extra dirt to be found. Frankly, I think some other DT (or non-DT) members ought to jump in and give this guy some paint just in case the members he's currently got splattered by fall off of DT at some point.  It happens.  I also think he needs to be sent a very clear, very strong message.
